title: REBUTTAL: John Oliver is Racist Against Asians | Louder with Crowder
description: John Oliver hates Asian people. We explain why. Also, Whoopi Goldberg made shockingly racist comments about the Holocaust. And we celebrate the start of Black History Month. No, really. #JohnOliver #Whoopi #BlackHistoryMonth
